archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: API Gateway Policy Evaluation
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Application Programming Interface Gateway Policy Evaluation function decision tasks makes it possible to have decision trees within a workflow or policy evaluation, at any nesting level. This is the basis for many possible micro-workflow related activities, making possible to configure a decision point structure where multiple option are present e.g. Charging, Application Management ( managing account information for recognizing applications and application developers)
